title: Local election latest... and other stories - BBC News
summary: the conservatives win overall majority on peterborough city council .
labour hold cambridge city council with increased majority .
conservative jason ablewhite elected police and crime commissioner .
new polar vessel to be named after sir david attenborough , but boaty mcboatface lives on .

documents.title: our coverage through the day
text: so that 's it for our coverage of the election results in cambridgeshire today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back on monday with the latest news , sport , weather and travel updates for the county from 08:00 .
do n't forget you can get involved any time by sending us your stories and via email , facebook or twitter .

documents.title: weather : dry tonight , hotter tomorrow
text: it will be staying largely dry through the rest of tonight with clear spells and areas of high cloud at times .
a light easterly breeze , but not as chilly as previous nights with temperatures only dipping to around 7c ( 45f ) .
tomorrow will be dry and very warm with sunny spells , hazy at times .
temperatures reaching highs of 24c ( 75f ) .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: 'i stonked it in huntingdonshire ' : new pcc
text: new cambridgeshire police and crime commissioner jason ablewhite says he `` stonked it '' with huntingdonshire voters , who he credited for delivering victory in the election .
the former leader of hunts district council received 16,500 first round votes in huntingdonshire , compared to dave baigent 's 7,797 , which he says put him on the path to victory .
he said one of the first things he will do is move the pcc office from cambourne back to police headquarters at hinchingbrooke .
jason david ablewhite taking the police and crime commissioner 's oath .
# cambspcc
congratulations to jason , the new @ twitterid @ twitterid !
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: labour 's dave baigent runner-up in race to be cambridgeshire pcc
text: labour 's dave baigent was runner-up in the pcc election - with 72,580 combined first and second choice votes .
tory jason ablewhite won with 81,581 votes .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingconservative jason ablewhite wins cambs pcc election
text: so it 's official - the conservative 's jason ablewhite has been elected as cambridgeshire 's new police and crime commissioner .

documents.title: jason ablewhite says he 's feeling confident
text: conservative jason ablewhite looking confident as he tells bbc radio cambridgeshire he 's thinks he 's done enough to be the county 's next pcc .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cambridge police officer dismissed for 'gross misconduct '
text: cambridgeshire police say a serving officer has been dismissed after a hearing found he had committed gross misconduct .
a police spokesperson said : `` in april 2015 the officer made inappropriate contact with a woman , causing her alarm and distress and then acted dishonestly by denying the contact with supervisors .
he also deliberately disposed of evidence '' .
dc russell figgis , based at parkside police station , was found to have breached the standards of professional behaviour around honesty and integrity and discreditable conduct .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: just one lot of votes to go in pcc second preference count
text: cambridge city 's second preference votes are in : jason ablewhite 2,760 , dave baigent 5,425 .
just peterborough left to go .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: liberal democrats make gains in south cambs
text: the liberal democrats have had some good news in south cambs , gaining three seats in the local election .
this follows some persistent canvassing by the party in the district - including delivering this reminder to potential voters yesterday .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: results of second round of pcc votes starting to come in
text: the results of the second round votes in the pcc election are coming in , with dave baigent for labour slightly ahead in east cambridgeshire , while conservative jason ablewhite was first in huntingdonshire .
the 2nd preference votes for east cambs have been counted .
jason ablewhite1259 , dave baigent 1319 .
# cambspcc # elections2016
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ukip 's nick clarke congratulates candidates for reaching 'play-offs '
text: ukip 's pcc candidate nick clarke has tweeted his congratulations to jason ablewhite and dave baigent after he was knocked-out in the first round of votes .
congratulations to cons and labour for getting into the play offs for cambs pcc
@ twitterid nick - how is it going- when might we hear ?
best
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man charged with wisbech murder appears in court
text: a wisbech man has appeared at huntingdon crown court charged with the murder of laraine rayner and preventing her lawful and decent burial .
ms rayner was discovered at a property in mill road in the town on 24 april .
a post-mortem examination concluded she died from a stab wound to the neck .
steven stocks , 43 , of north brink , wisbech , entered no plea and will next appear in court in june .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pcc election : how the first round votes stacked up
text: while we wait for the second round votes to be counted in the pcc election , here is the final tally of voting in the first round :
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: boaty mcboatface name goes down in history - on a sub
text: this remotely-operated submarine will be making sure the name boaty mcboatface will be remembered in future polar exploration .
the new £ 200m british antarctic survey-run polar research vessel it lives on will be named rrs sir david attenborough - despite boaty mcboatface topping a public poll for the main ship .
science minister jo johnson said : `` the ship has captured the imaginations of millions , which is why we 're ensuring that the boaty name lives on . ''
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: second round votes to decide who becomes cambridgeshire pcc
text: so with all the first round pcc votes declared there will be a short break before the second choice votes are counted , to decide whether conservative jason ablewhite or labour 's dave baigent is cambridgeshire 's next police and crime commissioner .
it means liberal democrat rupert moss-eccardt and ukip 's nick clarke are out the race .
the winner is expected to be announced at the ross peer centre in soham ( above ) later this afternoon .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: conservative and labour candidates through to second round of pcc vote
text: conservative jason ablewhite and labour 's dave baigent are through to the second round of the pcc election .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: going the extra mile to get elected in cambridge
text: new cambridge labour councillor sophie barnet estimates she walked 18 miles canvassing to get elected in romsey ward .
she beat long-time lib dem councillor catherine smart , who had represented the ward since 1998 .
former lib dem mp julian huppert told bbc radio cambridgeshire the city owes her a debt of gratitude for her 18 years of service .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: cambridge pcc first choice votes have labour in first place
text: the first round pcc votes from cambridge are in and have bucked the trend so far this afternoon by putting labour 's dave baigent first well ahead of conservative jason ablewhite .
perhaps not a surprise given how well labour did in the city in the local election , but it means the race to be police and crime commissioner is far from over .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man sought by police for breaching prison release licence conditions
text: a 19-year-old man wanted for recall to prison after breaching release licence conditions is sought by police in norfolk and cambridgeshire .
nicholas humphries ( links to the fairstead estate in king 's lynn but could also be in the peterborough area , police said .
he is described as of medium build and about 5ft 7in ( 1.70m ) tall .
he often uses a mountain bike and wears sports clothing .
anyone with information should contact police but should not approach him .
author: Patrick Byrne
BBC News

documents.title: sir david attenborough 'truly honoured ' by boat name
text: sir david attenborough says he is `` truly honoured '' to have a new £ 200m polar research vessel named after him .
cambridge-based british antarctic survey launched an online search for a name in which the suggestion boaty mcboatface was favourite .
but science minister jo johnson said the renowned broadcaster had a `` more suitable '' name .
cambridge graduate sir david , who 's turning 90 , said he hoped `` everyone who suggested a name will feel just as inspired to follow the ship 's progress as it explores our polar regions '' .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: independent wins in st neots , eaton socon & eynesbury by-election
text: independent simone leigh taylor has been elected as the county councillor for st neots , eaton socon & eynesbury in the by-election .
she polled 1,104 votes , 80 ahead of conservative karl david wainwright .
labour candidate doctor nik johnson came third , followed by independent james corley .
author: Emma Maclean
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: first round pcc votes have conservative candidate in poll position
text: first preference votes are in for most of cambridgeshire in the pcc election , and they have conservative candidate jason ablewhite in first place and labour 's dave baigent second .
still a long way to go this afternoon until we have a winner .
author: Emma Maclean
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: 'disappointing ' night for ukip in peterborough
text: ukip had a `` disappointing '' night in peterborough after losing two of its four seats on peterborough city council .
councillor paul bullen , the leader of the ukip group on cambridgeshire council , said the result was against the trend for the party nationally .
`` i honestly do n't know what went wrong , '' he told bbc radio cambridgeshire .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: live results being broadcast for cambs pcc election
text: for the latest on the # cambspcc election , take a look at the live results graphic : remember to keep refreshing .

documents.title: local elections round-up
text: so to recap then - fairly uneventful local elections in cambridgeshire , with the biggest news being the conservatives taking back control of peterborough city council .

documents.title: tories hold huntingdonshire district council
text: votes have been counted and the conservatives have held control of huntingdonshire district council , despite losing three seats .
independent candidates gained two seats and the lib dems one , leaving the election result as :
author: David Keller
BBC News

documents.title: breakingtories hold huntingdonshire
text: the conservatives have held control of huntingdonshire district council .

documents.title: south cambs remains true blue following election
text: south cambridgeshire district council remains true blue following the election :
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: motorcyclist injured in a14 crash
text: the east anglian air ambulance says a motorcyclist in his 20s was injured in a crash on the a14 near nine mile hill and newmarket earlier .
he was treated at the scene for a suspected broken arm and shoulder injury , before being taken to addenbrooke 's hospital in cambridge for further treatment .
the road has now reopened
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: counting begins in pcc vote
text: i 'm at the cambridgeshire pcc count at the ross peers sports centre in soham , where we 're hearing that we may not have a winner declared until about 17:30 .
author: Emma Maclean
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: cambridgeshire pcc turnout over 30 %
text: so verification of the vote has been completed and the overall turnout in cambridgeshire for the police and crime commissioner election was 30.55 % .
counting expected to begin soon .
this is almost double what it was last time .
turnout across the county in 2012 when sir graham bright was elected as cambridgeshire 's first pcc was 14.77 % .
total turnout for the # cambspcc election ( cambridgeshire & peterborough area ) was 30.56 %
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: count under way in huntingdonshire
text: the election count is underway , results are coming in - check our website for the latest information/results the

documents.title: 'have a celebration ' , cameron tells peterborough tories
text: `` have a celebration this weekend , the work begins on monday , '' david cameron told conservatives in peterborough .
he said jobs had been created in the city , new businesses had been set up , homes were being built and regeneration was taking place .
he added labour 's performance around the uk showed it had `` completely lost touch '' with hard-working people .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cameron : 'in peterborough we 've taken control of an important council '
text: `` in peterborough we 've taken control of an important council '' , says david cameron , who arrived in the city for the second time in a matter of days to congratulate conservative councillors .
the tories now have have a majority of two on peterborough city council .
`` you 've won because you worked hard and you deserve it , '' he told supporters .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: david cameron speech in peterborough
text: prime minister david cameron has just delivered a speech to people in peterborough to congratulate the city 's conservatives for regaining control of the council .
we 'll bring you updates on this very soon .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: breakingsouth cambridgeshire is conservative hold
text: all the results are in and south cambridgeshire district council is a conservative hold .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: former council leader in political comeback
text: this is the moment former conservative leader of peterborough city council marco cereste made his return to politics .
he was one of three tories who won seats in hampton vale ward , helping the party to regain control of the city .
cons .
have won another 3 seats in # peterborough in the new hampton vale ward , including marco # le2016 @ twitterid
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cambridge tories lose only seat in the city
text: it was also a bad night for the conservatives on cambridge city council who lost their only seat , in trumpington , to the liberal democrats .
former lib dem mp for the city , julian huppert , told bbc radio cambridgeshire the result was `` satisfying '' .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: cambs pcc election result expected this afternoon
text: results in the cambridgeshire police and crime commissioner election are expected this afternoon .
so far the highest turnout was in cambridge at 39.40 % .
the turnout in peterborough was 35.70 % , and in fenland 18.14 % .
for the latest on the # cambspcc election , take a look at the live results graphic : remember to keep refreshing .
author: Emma Maclean
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: former leader back on peterborough city council after election win
text: the former tory leader of peterborough city council , marco cereste , is back in politics in the city after winning a seat in hampton vale ward .
he was leader of the council for six years until losing his seat in stanground central in elections last may .
after the result he tweeted his thanks , but said he had no ambitions to become leader again .
thank you to everyone who voted for me and to those that did n't thank you all the same .
if you need my help i will be there for you .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: local election : first results coming in from south cambridgeshire
text: the first local election results are coming through from the count for south cambridgeshire district council .
first to be announced was the wilbrahams , which was a conservative hold .
this was followed by haslingfield and the eversdens , which is a gain for the liberal democrats .
keep following us for live results throughout the morning .
find out who the candidates are : # le2016 # outforthecount
@ twitterid puffles with @ twitterid on @ twitterid talking elections
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid hello to you all from the cambourne count # le2016 # outforthecount
author: Sam Edwards
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: cambridge mum 's 'blind panic ' as train pulled away with her 22-month-old daughter alone on board
text: a mum watched helplessly as a train pulled out of a station with her 22-month-old daughter trapped , alone , on board .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: armed police shut peterborough road
text: armed police shut a main peterborough road before raiding a house last night .
author: Peterborough Telegraph

documents.title: spectators warned over drinking at cambridge count
text: there was a bit of a party atmosphere at the start of the local election count in cambridge - with the returning officer having to remind people not to drink alcohol .
radio cambridgeshire 's julia greenaway reports that spectators were spotted with `` bottles of booze '' .
this is the moment the first ballot box arrived at the guildhall .
counting gets underway at # cambridge city council election count @ twitterid
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: polar research vessel to be named after sir david attenborough
text: a £ 200m polar research ship operated by cambridge-based british antarctic survey is to be named after fellow cambridge graduate and naturalist sir david attenborough , the government has announced .
those who voted for boaty mcboatface in their thousands , however , need not have a boaty mcsadface
the comical name will live on as one of the vessel 's high-tech remotely operated sub-sea vehicles .

announcing the decision , science minister jo johnson said : `` i 'm delighted that our state-of-the-art polar research ship will be named after one of the nation 's most cherished broadcasters and natural scientists '' .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: labour had 'a very good night ' in cambridge , says mep
text: the labour mep for the eastern region says the party had `` a very good night '' in cambridge .
the party retained control of cambridge city council and increased their majority after taking two seats off the liberal democrats .
they now hold 26 of the 42 seats on the council .
richard howitt told report julia greenaway labour now has its `` highest ever share '' of councillors in the city .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: conservatives win majority on peterborough city council
text: the conservatives are back in control of peterborough city council this morning after gaining four seats in the local elections .
the council had been in no overall control .
- led by the tories who were the largest party .
but today 's gains give them an overall majority of two .
these included a return to the council for former leader marco cereste , who lost his seat in last year 's elections .
author: Hannah Olsson
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire political reporter

documents.title: a14 crash : 'injuries not clear at this stage ' , say police
text: police have told us the crash on the a14 westbound near newmarket this morning involved a car and a motorbike .
a spokesman said details of injuries were `` not clear at this stage '' .
one lane remains closed near junction 35 .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: round-up of local elections in the east of england
text: if you were too tired to stay up , here 's a round-up of what happened in local elections in the east of england overnight

documents.title: travel : lane shut on a14 near newmarket after 'serious ' crash
text: a multi-vehicle crash described as `` serious '' by police is causing long delays on the a14 , with one lane closed westbound near newmarket .
there are also reports of congestion eastbound as people slow to look at the accident in the opposite carriageway .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: labour hold cambridge with increased majority
text: labour has kept control of cambridge city council with an increased majority .
the party gained two seats - romsey and west chesterton - from the liberal democrats .
they now have a majority of 10 at the council , which they took control of in 2014 .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a14 blocked westbound near newmarket after crash
text: the a14 is blocked westbound near the junction for nine mile hill , following a multi-vehicle crash .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: peterborough election goes to the wire
text: boundary changes meant all 60 seats on peterborough city council were being contested - the first set of votes to arrive for counting at peterborough arena were from orton waterville .
bit it was n't until the last set of votes from park ward were counted , that the conservatives achieved an overall majority of two .
the lib dems gained three seats , labour two and ukip lost two seats .
orton waterville was the first box to arrive at # peterborough arena for # le2016 @ twitterid
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : tories win majority on peterborough city council labour hold cambridge with increased majority
text: here are the headlines in cambridgeshire this morning :
author: Sam Edwards
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: weather : staying dry with plenty of sunshine
text: today will be fine and dry with plenty of sunshine .
it will become very warm with the highest temperatures likely around cambridge .
maximum temperature : 20c ( 68f ) .
for a more detailed forecast for where you live , head over to bbc weather .
author: Alina Jenkins
BBC Weather

documents.title: welcome to cambridgeshire live
text: good morning .
we 're here with all the latest on the local elections in cambridgeshire , as well the other news , sport , weather and travel updates for the county until 18:00 .
it looks as if it is going to be another lovely day - we 've got a full forecast coming shortly .
do n't forget you can get involved any time by sending us your stories and via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live
